author: Hillary Leung
title: ‘This Is Discrimination.’ Africans in One of China’s Major Cities Say They Are Targets After a Spike in COVID-19
description: Africans in the Chinese city of Guangzhou say they have been forced into quarantine and discriminated against after a spike in coronavirus cases.
content: Jay has been locked in his apartment in the southern Chinese megacity of Guangzhou since April 9—when a doctor, local official and a translator delivered a mandatory quarantine order due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The order came despite the fact that he hasn’t… [+7787 chars]
